Articles.Content:
Hey yall!

Would anyone out there wanna draw an front cover for a (future) part mod?

The mod is called "Betty & Roger's Hotpants and Rocket Emporium", or just Rocket Emporium for short.
I'd like a goofy drawing/rendering of this couple, potentially with their whole sale market in the background.

* Roger has a mustasch
* Betty has a ribbon in her hair
* Both likes hotpants and space suits

Any quality is ok =)
I am interested. Finals coming and wrapping up for me. Message me for details if you want!
